name: Crazy Match
description:
Crazy Match brings you to experience an intriguing block game! Place blocks to make and destroy full lines horizontally or vertically, and prevent blocks from filling the screen.

Now, new interesting modes inject great vitalities into this classic game! Plus, four well-designed themes with distinctive background music: Colorful Blocks, Naughty Monsters, Cute Animals, and Dreamy Candies.

Three Modes:
- Classic: Place blocks to create and destroy full lines.
- Bomb: Clear the bomb within the limited steps.
- Magic: Use magic blocks tactfully to help you get more points.

Crazy Match is completely free to play, including all game modes, themes and undo function. Just get it and have fun!
